#summary How to uninstall FreeNAS RSS Extension for Transmission
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

There currently is no uninstall file to automate the process, but uninstallation is not overly difficult.


= Details =
  # `rm /usr/local/www/extension_rss_*`
  # `rm -rf /usr/local/www/ext/rss/`
  # `rm -rf YOUR_INSTALL_DIR`
  # Delete the cron job in System|Advanced|cron
  # In Advanced|Execute enter the following command in the PHP command textbox:
{{{
unset($config['rss']);
write_config();
}}}
